sentences.en: Anthology Pav é Diamond is also available as a ring or bracelet.
sentences.cn: 备有指环或手镯以供选择.

sentences.en: Despite some artful editing, the anthology is a weak one.
sentences.cn: 除了编辑上的一些巧妙之处，这本选集乏善可陈。

sentences.en: He edited that anthology of poems.
His works are included in this anthology of stories.
sentences.cn: 这本小说集收录了他的作品.

sentences.en: I have an anthology of modern quotations.
sentences.cn: 我有一本现代名言集萃.

sentences.en: It is an anthology that crackles with wit and wisdom.
sentences.cn: 这是一本妙语连珠、智慧洋溢的文集.

sentences.en: It was an anthology of interviews Borges did in his eighties.
sentences.cn: 这是一本博尔赫斯80多岁时接受专访的选集.

sentences.en: Michael Rosen is the editor of the anthology.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·罗森是这本选集的编者。

sentences.en: Sam struck on that anthology in a second hand book store.
sentences.cn: 萨姆在一家旧书店里偶然发现了那本选集.

sentences.en: She wrote down several poems in this anthology from memory.
sentences.cn: 她在文集中写下了记忆中的若干首诗歌.

sentences.en: The anthology has a surprising sense of coherence.
sentences.cn: 整本选集有着惊人的连贯性。

sentences.en: The anthology reveals a prejudice in favour of lyric poets.
sentences.cn: 这部选集显示出对抒情诗人有所偏爱.

sentences.en: The female basically is for beautiful and anthology wear high - heeled shoes.
sentences.cn: 女性主要是为了美观而选穿高跟鞋.

sentences.en: This anthology comprises samples from the work of ten authors.
sentences.cn: 这本文选包含了十个作家的作品范例.

sentences.en: Varied though the anthology may claim to be, it does not cover the whole gamut of Scottish poetry.
sentences.cn: 该诗集虽然可能号称收录广泛，但并未涵盖所有苏格兰诗歌。

words.tran_cn: 把…收入选集；编纂…的选集

trans.tran_en: a set of stories, poems, songs etc by different people collected together in one book
